Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementaryRule, TotalisticRule
    public abstract class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
    The Rule class is an abstract class designed to create new Rule objects and use the rule to evolve generations and neighborhoods.
    Author:
    Natalie hill

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean[] rules

      Retrieves cell states in the neighborhood of the cell with the given index.

      Retrieves the rule number passed to the Rule constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getRuleNum

        public int getRuleNum()
        Retrieves the rule number passed to the Rule constructor.
        Returns:
        rule number that was passed to the Rule constructor

      • getNeighborhood

        public abstract boolean[] getNeighborhood​(int idx,
                                          Generation gen)
        Retrieves cell states in the neighborhood of the cell with the given index.
        Parameters:
        idx - index in the given Generation
        gen - Generation to be searched
        Returns:
        boolean array of cell states according to the given index

      • evolve

        public abstract boolean evolve​(boolean[] neighborhood)
        Determines the next state of a cell given the current neighborhood.
        Parameters:
        neighborhood - boolean array of cell states
        Returns:
        expected cell state given the neighborhood passed to the method

      • evolve

        public Generation evolve​(Generation gen)
        Creates the next Generation given the current Generation.
        Parameters:
        gen - Generation to be searched
        Returns:
        expected Generation given the previous generation of cell states

      • ruleTableString

        public abstract java.lang.String ruleTableString​(char falseSymbol,
                                                 char trueSymbol)
        Displays all of the rules and their outputs with the ability to change the false and true statements.
        Parameters:
        falseSymbol - char that represents the false value
        trueSymbol - char that represents the true value
        Returns:
        table of rules and its output in the form of a String

      • getNeighborhoodByRadius

        public static boolean[] getNeighborhoodByRadius​(int idx,
                                                int radius,
                                                Generation gen)
        Retrieves the next cell states of an index by the radius' value.
        Parameters:
        idx - index used to specify start of method
        radius - specifies how far to go from index to get other states in generation
        gen - Generation of cell states
        Returns:
        boolean array of cell states a radius value away from the index
